aircraft.title: Falcon 50EX and Falcon 50
aircraft.label: Nationwide, Floating Fleet
aircraft.desc: The Falcon 50, and Falcon 50EX, is a comfortable, nine-seat supermid jet with coast-to-coast range, and tremendous performance capabilities to land at short runways and high altitude airports.
aircraft.priceHeading: What is the price charter this jet?  How does charter jet pricing compare to jet cards and fractional pricing?
aircraft.priceDetails: Average, nationwide Ajax Jet retail charter cost per occupied hour, Falcon 50 / 50EX: $7,000
aircraft.flightSpecsHeading: How far can a Falcon 50 fly nonstop?
flightSpecsDetails: Falcon 50 specifications, including cabin height, length, seating chart, and range are included in the chart
Typical charter flights for a Falcon 50: Los Angeles to New York, Boston to Tortola, Anchorage to Denver, Miami to Aspen, Seattle to Maui
aircraft.quoteHeading: Do you need a jet charter quote?   Let our charter specialists handle every detail of your private charter flight on one of our Falcon 50 super midsize jets.
aircraft.aircraftManagement: Do you own a Falcon 50?  Partner with Ajax Jets to make your asset suit your lifestyle and financial objectives.
aircraft.aircraftMaintenance: Do you use Falcon 50 maintenance or repair services?   Ajax Jets specializes in Falcon maintenance services, parts, avionics, TFE 731 engine leasing and maintenance, that will keep your asset airworthy and on budget.
aircraft.aircraftAcquisition: Put Ajax Jets’ vast experience in aircraft acquisition and management to use when evaluating a Falcon 50 for purchase.  Our private jet sales team is intricately familiar with the Falcon 50 model, market conditions, maintenance items, aircraft valuations and overall suitability into the Falcon 50 charter program.  In addition, aircraft that are currently operating in the program are available for sale and turnkey management.
